Contact

Would you like to know more about private English lessons or about the translation/proofreading of a text?

Send me an e-mail at info@theenglishnook.ch, or use the contact form below, and I would be delighted to answer your questions.

English Nook /ˈɪŋɡl(ɪ)ʃnʊk/ n [ingle + shh + nook] 1: a quiet, cosy corner dedicated to English lessons and translation 2 gen : a place to learn or study English with the support of a caring teacher
